members.name: getTarget
members.comment: Returns the target URI of this SignatureProperty.

members.name: getId
members.comment: Returns the Id of this SignatureProperty.

return: the Id of this SignatureProperty (or null if not specified)

members.name: getContent
members.comment: Returns an unmodifiable list of one or more XMLStructures that are contained in this SignatureProperty. These represent additional information items concerning the generation of the XMLSignature (i.e. date/time stamp or serial numbers of cryptographic hardware used in signature generation).

return: an unmodifiable list of one or more XMLStructures

name: javax.xml.crypto.dsig.SignatureProperty
